self_evaluation.header: You need to perform evaluations in order to know your different Feel Good levels. You can change your mind and update them as much as you wish even for already evaluated items !

draft_saved.body:
You can take time to think and finish it 
at any time in your Feel Good Tools.

evaluation_saved.header:
Your feel good scores 
have been updated accordingly.
evaluation_saved.body:
You can go now to the 'Your Feel Good GPS' page  
to see the latests updates.

signup_success.body:
Welcome to your space! 

 You can now self-evaluate everything in your life. Satisfaction scores will be calculated and updated 
 in real time following your evaluations.

delete_account.body: Thanks for your time with the I Feel Good app. The team hope that you will be back soon.

specific.body: Address precisely at least one of the following questions: Who, What, Where?

measurable.body: Indicate a milestone in order to quantify the progress (it's totally OK even if it's a tiny milestone).

achievable.body: Your goal should not be to high too avoid frustrations, nor too low because you will feel bored.

relevant.body: The action must be in line with your priorities, the context and the external constraints.

time_based.body: Set a deadline to motivate yourself: you can choose a periodic deadline (per day, per week etc…), or an unique deadline.

smart.footer: Finally, begin your action with a verb !

feature_not_available.header: Sorry, this feature isn't available at this moment!

network_not_available.header: Your device does not have an Internet connection, please note that some functionalities will not work properly

license.title: Terms and conditions
license.description: These terms and conditions are an agreement between Mobile Application Owner ("Mobile Application Owner", "us", "we" or "our") and you ("User", "you" or "your"). This Agreement sets forth the general terms and conditions of your use of the I FEEL GOOD mobile application and any of its products or services (collectively, "Mobile Application" or "Services").

accounts_and_membership.title: Accounts and membership
accounts_and_membership.description: If you create an account in the Mobile Application, you are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and you are fully responsible for all activities that occur under the account and any other actions taken in connection with it. We may, but have no obligation to, monitor and review new accounts before you may sign in and use our Services. You must immediately notify us of any unauthorized uses of your account or any other breaches of security. We will not be liable for any acts or omissions by you, including any damages of any kind incurred as a result of such acts or omissions. We may suspend, disable, or delete your account (or any part thereof) if we determine that you have violated any provision of this Agreement or that your conduct or content would tend to damage our reputation and goodwill. If we delete your account for the foregoing reasons, you may not re-register for our Services. We may block your email address and Internet protocol address to prevent further registration.

user_content.title: User content
user_content.description: We do not own any data, information or material ("Content") that you submit in the Mobile Application in the course of using the Service. You shall have sole responsibility for the accuracy, quality, integrity, legality, reliability, appropriateness, and intellectual property ownership or right to use of all submitted Content. We may, but have no obligation to, monitor and review Content in the Mobile Application submitted or created using our Services by you. Unless specifically permitted by you, your use of the Mobile Application does not grant us the license to use, reproduce, adapt, modify, publish or distribute the Content created by you or stored in your user account for commercial, marketing or any similar purpose. But you grant us permission to access, copy, distribute, store, transmit, reformat, display and perform the Content of your user account solely as required for the purpose of providing the Services to you.

backups.title: Backups
backups.description: We perform regular backups of the Content and will do our best to ensure completeness and accuracy of these backups. In the event of the hardware failure or data loss we will restore backups automatically to minimize the impact and downtime.

link.title: Links to other mobile applications
link.description: Although this Mobile Application may link to other mobile applications, we are not, directly or indirectly, implying any approval, association, sponsorship, endorsement, or affiliation with any linked mobile application, unless specifically stated herein. We are not responsible for examining or evaluating, and we do not warrant the offerings of, any businesses or individuals or the content of their mobile applications. We do not assume any responsibility or liability for the actions, products, services, and content of any other third-parties. You should carefully review the legal statements and other conditions of use of any mobile application which you access through a link from this Mobile Application. Your linking to any other off-site mobile applications is at your own risk.

changes.title: Changes and amendments
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify this Agreement or its policies relating to the Mobile Application or Services at any time, effective upon posting of an updated version of this Agreement in the Mobile Application. When we do, we will post a notification in our Mobile Application. Continued use of the Mobile Application after any such changes shall constitute your consent to such changes.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of these terms
acceptance.description: You acknowledge that you have read this Agreement and agree to all its terms and conditions. By using the Mobile Application or its Services you agree to be bound by this Agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the terms of this Agreement, you are not authorized to use or access the Mobile Application and its Services.

contact.title: Contacting us
contact.description: If you would like to contact us to understand more about this Agreement or wish to contact us concerning any matter relating to it, you may send an email to ifeelgood.hello@gmail.com

license.end: This document was last updated on September 7, 2019

welcome.paragraph: You are the GPS of your lifestyle

signup.title:
Sign up 
to get started !
signup.email_not_available: Hmmm... we are sorry, this E-mail is already registered. Please choose another E-mai address.

forgot.title: Forgot Password
forgot.message: The link to reset your password has just been sent to your mailbox !

description.relationships: Evaluate people who influence my energy and moods.
description.activities: Evaluate occupations that change my physical and mental states.
description.intakes: Evaluate absorptions that impact my body and mind.
description.other: Evaluate any other aspect that modifies my vitality and spirit.

header.title: Your Feel Good cursor
header.body: The scores you gave during self-assessments are used to calculate an average feel good score.

subtitle.good: Factors that are on good track, you can set actions in 'Feel Good Tools' to secure them.
subtitle.normal: You can perform priority 2 actions to minimize the possible negative sides of these elements
subtitle.bad: You can try to analyze 'WHY ?' and set actions as priority 1 to change. You may need help from professionnals to get out of the situation

relationships.name: Is there anyone who gives you joy or negative waves ?

activities.name: Is there an activity that you would like to continue or to get rid of ?

intakes.name: Is there an intake that made you feel good or feel uncomfortable ?

other.name: Is there any other element that contributes to modifty your energy or moods ?

reset_pwd.success: Your password is resetted. Now you can sign in with your new password.

errors.sign_in_fail: Your E-mail or password is not correct

summarize.title: Next you can see here in a glance your summarized and detailed feel good scores. They are updated right after each new evaluation. The more you make introspection, the more you can be aware of what is truly important for you !

evaluationItem.title: HELLO and WELCOME ! :) We suggest you to choose 1 among those 4 categories to start your inner journey. Once familiar with the app, each mini inner journey takes very little of your time !

feelGoodTools.title: Here you will find the app's YouTube page for guide videos, initiate actions to increase your feel good level or finish your drafts.

name.title: Type only 1 answer here. If you have several answers in mind you can make other evaluations once this one is finished :)

category.title: Assign here one sub-category for your answer.

desc.title: If you wish you can write here more details related to the answer above. Otherwise you can leave it empty and go to the next step.
